title: Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion
description: In this lab, you will learn how to write a function that converts temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius, using the formula C = (F - 32) * 5 / 9.

meta.title: Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to convert temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius with a simple formula and Python code example.
meta.keywords: python playground, python, temperature conversion, fahrenheit to celsius, python programming, coding tutorial

verify.name: Verify Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
